Today was an interesting day. This whole week actually.....
Got asked on a few dates Woo-Hoo! :0)

Hmmmm.. I seem to be a year older but yet still look younger...
Woo-Hoo again!! hehe! You haven't seen nothing yet! Wait until I'm done loosing my last 20 lbs! :0)


I kept get these damn Migraine headaches all this week though. You know the sensitivity to light & nasuea etc. So I was telling my friend about it at work and her response - Is something on your mind maybe? Because sometime's if your thinking too much, have alot on your mind, or even stress can cause that. Very interesting I didn't think of that. I kinda drew a blank when she asked me. I mean stuff's been on my mind but I have been ignoring ALOT that's been going on. Just for my own sanity. Best thing for me really. I feel much better then I have in a long time not having thing's on my mind or worrying or dealing with negative people who were in my life. I've been saving money too which is a great feeling. The greatest feeling in the world for me right now is that I feel free and I am doing what I WANT for once. Plus I don't have to answer to anybody but myself!

Tonight I had to go back into work to pick up my check (So I didn't have to go in again on my day off.) I got there much later then I had thought I would. On my way out Roger asked me if he could catch a ride with me to the train station. I haven't been eating much lately so I was starving and about to grab some food somewhere so I asked him if he would like to join me. He said sure so we went to Mama Sbarros and got some food. I had a good time! He is one of the people I enjoy talking to most at work :) It was really sweet he paid for my dinner too :) Glad I asked him to get together :)

It's weird how lately I just don't want to eat. I've been doing this for weeks. I won't eat anything during the day, I just get real thirsty and constantly drink seltzer, Light Lemonade or Iced Tea at work. Just basically I'll eat a small dinner at night and that's all I seem to want. (I've even been staying away from the food at work.) I did go to McDonalds later tonight and got myself one of those Fruit & Walnut Salads though. It was good but it was so hard finishing it. It took me an hour just to eat that thing but I know I really needed to eat.

Ahhhh time to watch more of my Who's The Boss boxset ::Smiles::
Don't laugh but I have been renting lots of dvd's from my public library. It's free so you can't beat that. Plus you get to keep them for a week. One boxset I rented was the first season of Dawson's Creek. I forgot how good the first season was.... I know I'm cheesy but the whole Joey & Dawson thing reminded so much of my old neighborhood guys and how we hung out at the lake! And we used to make movies like that with all my friends haha! :0)

I feel so drained lately. Just catching up on a busy weekend.
Sometime's my thyroid bother's me and makes me feel sick.
I don't like that feeling but it happen's sometime's. It would
be nice to be hugged in my sleep when I feel sick like this :(

Other then that I have been feeling really good & have been trying not
to think of thing's that have been going on. Alot of people have said to me I can do alot better in the boyfriend department and I believe their right. I was telling my good friend the other day that he as my friend treat's me better way better then my ex has been treating me lately. Something to think about.... I really believe one day he will realize what he lost....
Life works in funny ways sometime's if something is truelly meant to be it will keep bumping into you and eventually people wake up and realize things. Love can be tricky, You can walk away "still" loving a person not because you wanted to stop loving them but because they stopped loving you and you had to walk away. Sometime's they still love you but are too stubborn to admit it and walk away for whatever reason. I for one always let someone know exactly how I feel about them before I walk away. I don't like to leave thing's unsaid because I might never get that chance again to say how I really felt....

My Ex called me to wish me a Happy Birthday on my Birthday. I was really surprised because I didn't expect that....

Work's been going well. I really like the group of people I work with. Their good people :) Me & Roger always get into these deep coversations at work. I love our convos. We always have something to talk about or joke about :) Same thing with Mario. He's really funny & jokes around alot. Sometimes I give my friend Mario rides near my house because he works a 2nd job a block away from me. And the other night I'm getting out of my car and I hear JULIE, JULIE. And I'm looking around because in the dark I didn't know who it was. And as soon as I heard his voice I went is that Mario? LOL! Him & his friend started laughing. And he was like yes it's me hehe! I'm like OMG Hey Mario! He was walking to catch the train & he had seen me drive by :)

It's funny but I always have alot of guy friend's. It's really rare that I hang out with any girl's. I think it's because alot are really catty and I'm not. Guys just say how it is and I think that's why I enjoy their company more. I'm friend's with a couple girl's from work their actually really cool because their not typical girls or catty at all.

Tonight I had some some of my left over Strawberry shortcake B-Day Cake & watched some of my "Who's The Boss" boxset my parents got me :) I love 80's show's like that. It's been so long since I watched alot of those show's that its like watching them over for the first time again. I also got the dvd Good Will Hunting too. Such a great movie! I love watching movies curled up in my bed with my big poofy IKEA blankets. My cat also curls up with me :) I call her my little itty bitty. She always keeps me company.

Can't wait to go to The Witches Brew again - I absolutely loved it there! So my scene. I don't even care if I meet anyone. It's a great place to go with friends and it's just somewhere I can go be myself. :0)

I like Myspace, But it's a confusing place. It makes my head hurt sometimes lol!

Been changing my Music website & other websites. They needed some updating. I can't wait to add music samples to my site for everyone to hear. I believe this is the year of change for me. Positive change. And I've needed this for such a long time.... Prepare to see a new Julie emerge! :0)




Monday, May 30, 2005

  It's My Birthday!
Current mood: cheerful 


 

mood:  Cheerful

It's My 31st Birthday Today :) I'm glad I don't look 31 atleast lol! ::Smiles:: Just last week someone told me I reminded them of their neighbor. And the woman says "You look about her age too she's in 11th grade" So naturally I started to laugh. And I said "Actually I'm 30 and will be 31 nex't week!" She was in shock and couldn't believe I was much older. She felt so bad & I said No it's ok alot of people think I look younger, Thanks for the compliment! :0)

Today I went to a BBQ out East for my Birthday with Friends & Family. I had a really nice time. My mom makes the best food! Sipped some Strawberry Daiquiris. :) The weather was so beautiful out today too :) Went down to the old neighborhood Lake with Bill to take some pictures for old time's sake. They just put in a new dock, floating dock & bridge. One of us expected to get pushed in the water at some point haha! Just like old times :)

Went out with my friend & my sister for my Birthday to California Pizza Kitchen & then after to The Witches Brew! (Got lost in the ghetto for awhile but we finally made it out and found the place! lol! Long story haha!) Had a really great time! This place is amazing! I felt so refreshed! What a great place to go for my Birthday! It's totally my scene. It's an old house with dark gothy decor, Blue lights in every window, Hanging On the fireplaces to the blue chandeliers, big comfy couches with blue candlelit tables. The Menu was huge & it was just coffees, Teas & Desserts. It took forever for us to order because the menu was so big! They had the most interesting kinds of drinks & desserts with ghoulish names hehe! I had this Blue Moon drink which was huge it was an Italian soda with Blueberry, Vanilla & marshmallows on top :) And the dessert my god chocolate overload with the Mississippi Mud cake!! My sister got her tea served in this little black gothic witch tea pot. (I so want one of those!) It was such a nice night out too, warm enough the doors were open & a nice breeze was coming into the place. As soon as we pulled up you could see the employees cars. It's nice to know I'm not the only one who enjoys driving and old car! I saw a nice blue 57 chevy & a few other 70's car's! It's such a great place to hang out order some good tea's or coffee and talk with your friend's! It was a very mixed crowd too.... My sister and friend liked it and we plan to go back soon :)Leaving here I defenitely felt, lofty, edgey and contained :0) I defenitely Plan to go here around Halloween time too!

Have you seen these cookies? I'm a big Star Wars fan so the kid in me had to buy these Star Wars Lava striped cookies haha! There's really no purpose but they look cool as hell! I can't wait to see this movie! I love Star Wars just as much as the nex't person but the people who camped out days before just to see a midnight showing was alittle much haha! I mean hell I would of went if I got tickets but no camping out! I'll just wait the few weeks till I can actually get a seat! 

It's funny how I missed being online when I wasen't able to get online. I really don't know why I did. I didn't miss much. Now that I'm here people haven't been around as much or acting quiet. Oh well. The online world is a little strange at time's. I'll tell you though it's real nice to have access to my music though! 

Damn I've missed out on recording Garbage on The Letterman show & other things because I wasen't online for a month and didn't even hear about it until I got back online :( Anyone have a copy of that I can copy? (Disappointed) I really want to buy the new Garbage Concert T- Shirts but I haven't seen any to buy yet.

Well I'm single once again & going to be 31 in a few days. It feels like De Ja Vous, I spent my 30th birthday like this too. Same Guy, Similar reasons. Infact it always happens 2 weeks before my birthday or His for whatever reason. This time I feel a little bit of relief though. I feel a real positive change coming on. I need a change. I'm trying not to think of thing's. And it's about time. It's nice to be free. This is what I remind myself everyday "I did everything I could do & now it is totally out of my control."  "If it is truelly meant to be, in time it will fix itself." Thanks to all of you who posted me some really great advice on the subject of my ex! That was some of the best advice I have gotten :) 

I'll be honest though for anyone getting to know me right now- be patient with me. I'm trying to approach thing's with an open mind but I may get freaked at time's. It take's me awhile to trust anyone or fully warm up to someone. 

Been taking alot of photography pics for my music website and portfolio. Soon to be posted on my site. I've been doing photography since high school and it's something I really enjoy.... Especially Black & White Photography....

Ok My Ex Or Man Or Boyfriend. That's a great way for me to explain him because I couldn't tell you what our status is to tell you the truth. All I know is he is either coming back in my life or doesn't want me in it. Depending what his mood is. Sometime's he care's for me or sometime's he does stupid thing's I can't explain. Sometime's he has a temper, he get's upset and blow's up over little thing's sometime's he doesn't. Sometime's he treat's me like a princess, sometime's he ignore's me. The more I ignore him the more he want's to see me, the more I pay attention him the more he ignores me. Go figure. He won't tell his family he sees me because he care's too much what they think, But yet he still see's me. He love's my gothy side and my hair but yet won't say to his family hey this is what I like! If they knew he was seeing me again this year he would never hear the end of it, So he doesn't say anything to them. Sometime's he's a bachelor, sometime's he's not. Sometime's I'm single, Sometime's I'm not. On & Off this year we're either dating or not. He takes me out on date's pays for me and all that. We spent alot of weekend's and our days off hanging out or staying at each other's places snuggling when we fall asleep at night. He'll do sweet little thing's for me like cleaning off my car when it snow's or making me dvd's or giving me Police picture's of himself. He'll always ask how my family is. Really had hoped one day we'd get married but he can't seem to tell me an answer over this past year or what he want's. He told me my job's not good enough for him. He want's someone that makes more money so *HE* can live more comfortably. It all comes down to money. Or him. Money is important but it's not everything. So I'm tired of not knowing. I'm tired of not having a yes or no answer. Tired of caring for someone who doesn't give 100 percent back like he used to. I'm tired of not being good enough for him. I'm tired of wasting my precious time for him for him only to end up with someone else and me ending up being hurt in the outcome. I'm tired of trying, explaining myself or changing for him. I'm tired of walking around on eggshells around him to please him. I'm tired of not being able to know everything that's going on. So I gave up because I know I deserve better. I deserve 100 percent of someone's attention everyday!! Not randomly. But yet it's like a big trick he care's about me and can be soo damn perfect at time's and other time's he doesn't care about me all and only care's about himself. My friend think's he's Bi-Polar. He might honestly be.... So I know he has sent me on a huge rollercoaster ride at time's over the past 2 years or so. And I believe I have finally gotten off that ride for the time being.... And I'm finally feeling like me again. Hoping to start a new chapter of my life.... Because there's only so much someone's heart can broken, Only so many time's you can try to glue it back together.

Seriously have some patience with me! Me + Trusting someone = A Long Time.....I need alot of attention. I won't lie. Don't smother me though cause that will only scare me off. But I like someone who like's to talk & will talk to me and give me their undivided attention. Someone who will listen to me when I ramble. Please don't ignore me while watching sports. I hate when guys do that to me lol! If you just explain to me what's going on in the game I'll be happy. Don't expect me to give the world to you in just one day. A world take's time.... If you go to fast and try to rush me, I will shut down, It will majorly turn me off and I will most likely talk to you less or not at all. When your too high on yourself, That turn's me off too. When I'm mad at you I will get quiet until I can't take anymore then I will finally say what's on my mind. Remember I'm a girl, We always say nothing's wrong. When we say that that means something is wrong and ask us what you did wrong. lol! I don't like when people criticize me, constantly correct me or order me around. If you do this to me (Especially ordering me around) I will most likely ignore you at first, Then tell you hell no I ain't doing that! Do it yourself! I don't dig when guys have meaningless flings with girls. Please tell me why you all do it? To be able to find out one truth of one male quality - That would be the one I'd like to know about. I just don't understand the logic behind it. Can someone honestly tell me the point and explain it to me? I won't judge, I just want to know why is all.... Hey even the people you love do this to you too, Trust me I know, it's not aimed at any one person, Just alot of guys do it is all. I guess alot of girls are different in that way. I dunno.


God lately I have the worst insomnia... I hate when that happen's ugh. So I'm up again trying to get some thought's outta my mind.... One day everything will make sense I hope. Damn Thyroid. It's amazing how much your thyroid contol's your entire body and mind. Before I was on medication it was horrible. It turn's out I had a thyroid problem for quite a few year's but it went undetected. I didn't feel right for quite sometime and I knew something wasen't right. For year's they did all these test's didn't know what was wrong with me. Didn't know why I was getting heart palpitation's, Dizziness, anxiety, panic attacks or couldn't sleep. To explain myself then, I was like a different person. When I went on medication I became me again and all these symptoms disappeared. Sounds weird I know. One of my Best Friend's Bill has the same thyroid problem as me. Same exact thing happend to him too. 2 December's ago I got soooo thin because my thyroid problem is the one that make's you loose weight, I was the thinnest I had ever been and I looked so sick. My face got all sunken in and my eyes actually bulged a bit. I was constantly hungry and thirsty. So thirsty I could never seem to quench my thirst. Could eat anything I wanted and would keep loosing weight. I felt like I was going to faint and would turn sooo ghost white pale because they found out I was anemic (Also caused from my thyroid condition) Some women would say this is a gift, Trust me it's not. It messes with your mind when you don't get your time of the month. Throw's your body off whack. I didn't get my time of the month for like 5 years! Again because of my thyroid. Trust me when I say your thyroid does freaky things to your mind and body.... I got reoccuring pheumonia for month's. (reoccuring sickness' is common when your not on medicine) Never was so sick before in my life. My hair was falling out alot, Thank god I naturally have really thick hair so no one could tell as much. I had extremely dry skin and would get really bad eczema. All again from my thyroid. I'll tell you the worst part of it all was getting Heart Palpitation's and Panic Attack's constantly. I felt as if I was going to have a heart attack or I was going to die. That's how bad it was. I honestly hated that feeling when that would happen to me. When my boyfriend & I lived together he would hug me at night and try to comfort me telling me everything was ok. So many time's I used to get up at night and watch T.V. too, Sleeping used to be so hard to do then. I was afriad to sleep because as soon as I'd try to sleep my heart would race. Thank God medication fixed all this....

Me & Brian go way back :0) Thanks for this great E-mail Brian! :0) "RELAXATION & HARMONY" Is there anyone who hasn't had the experience of desperately wanting something-job, money, lover or what ever, only to see it further recede the more we want it? But if we somehow dissolve the desperation, the thing wanted the most flows to us like magic. If a lonely man walks down the street, longing for a girlfriend or wife to cure the pain in his heart, he will burn through three pairs of shoes without easing his troubled mind. If he can detach himself from the fear that exists beneath the longing, the fear that he is no good & incomplete, he can accept that he is ok right now and at one with all there is and ever will be. Then he will exude a positive energy & his smile will be warmly returned up & down the block. It is the law of the universe that what ever you put out is what you get back. If I am open, generous & loving, I will experience life as safe, abundant and full of love. If I am tense and fearful, & view life as dangerous and hostile, my life will reflect that fearful reality. How could it not? Are we having fun? Or do we feel angry, jealous, lonely & guilty? If we are in pain, we are not relaxed & we are resisting; we have blocked the flow. Fear is the source of the blockage; it underlies your painful, negative emotions, even though its presence is usually hidden. A woman resigns from her job. "I liked the job but there was too much pressure, I couldn't take it." "What kind of pressure?" "They always made me feel that if I didn't perform perfectly, I'd get fired." She was afraid she would lose her job. In order to placate her fear, she quit her job. The kind of "perfectly rational" thing we do every day. What else could she have done? She could have relaxed. Perhaps they were pressing her to do it perfectly; but perhaps, out of her own lack of self-esteem, the fear that she was not good enough, she created the pressure she could not handle. She could have said to herself "Since I like this job, why don't I just stop worrying about doing it perfectly & just go with it, have fun. If they fire me, they fire me, but in the meantime I'll be doing a job I like, having fun with it, & who knows what tomorrow holds anyway?" Fear blocks our reality of the universe by warping our perception. It sends us guiltily into the past or anxiously into the future, rather than letting us relax in the present. There is a Zen story about a man chased by two tigers. Trapped at the edge of a cliff, he seizes a vine and lets himself over the side. As he hangs on the side of the cliff he sees a tiger above him at the top. Looking down he sees the other tiger waiting for him at the bottom. Then two mice begin chewing through the vine from which he hangs. At the moment with his life in the balance, he sees a wild strawberry growing out of the cliff wall beside him. He picks the strawberry and eats it, thinking how delicious it tastes. In a crystalline moment between life & death we can waste our short time on the vine fretting away our life, or we can let go of our fear & enjoy the strawberry. What we must begin to start studying is Harmony! The first stage of this study is the realization that we are responsible for our lack of harmony, for your own tension and fear. Disharmony, in a person or situation does not enter our lives from without. We create it from within. The great illusion of disempowerment is that the crises & difficulties of life in themselves are responsible for our disharmony. "A great mountain can collapse at your feet & you need not change countenance" we are in control. Not the ferocious attacker, not even death & dying; whether we react to those things with terror or with harmony is up to us, not them. There is nothing that in and of itself need destroy your sense of well-being. We can change disharmony, transform tension into relaxation, fear into joy & illness into health. The power is in us, not in the situation or in the other person. Harmony is itself paradise. The "miraculous" element is the way that relaxation, welling being, & harmony allow your heart & mind to take control of & focus the greatness of the universe, the power of thought, & the effect that this can have in ourselves & in the world. So the moral of this story is to - RELAX, RELAX INTO THE WORLD & RELAX INTO YOUR BEING.
